name: Black Sweater Wearing Llama
description:
Black-Sweater-Wearing-Llama is a 2D Platformer/Puzzle game that is very early in the development in the Unity3D engine!

If it looks interesting make sure to give it a follow:D

Future mechanics will include:

  • Local Multiplayer
  • Endless Runner Mode

    • •Choas Mode

    CONTROLS

    A,D or ◄► to Move

    Space to Jump

    ESC to Pause
